original_text: And with many other words he bore witness and continued to exhort them, saying, “Save yourselves from this crooked generation.”
korean_text: 또 여러 말로 확증하며 권하여 이르되 너희가 이 패역한 세대에서 구원을 받으라 하니

sentences.original_text: And with many other words he bore witness
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 여러 다른 말로 증언했습니다

sentences.original_text: saying, “Save yourselves from this crooked generation.”
